Token.Abstract: A component which consumes Visit objects and events and requests content through the API. If content is returned, then depending upon application state and SD settings, it is responsible for displaying OS notifications and launching a content view or an application deep link. This component is not part of the default set of managers that are loaded and users who want content services will add this object or a subclass of this object to the bus at startup.
Called when a Visit to a new Location and Placement is beginnng

Parameter.Name: visit
Parameter.Abstract: Visit object which contains information on start, end and accumulated and elapsed dwell time

Token.Abstract: Called periodically as a user remains in a current Location and Placement

Parameter.Name: visit
Parameter.Abstract: Visit object which contains information on start, end and accumulated and elapsed dwell time

Token.Abstract: Called when a Visit to a new Location and Placement has ended

Parameter.Name: visit
Parameter.Abstract: Visit object which contains information on start, end and accumulated and elapsed dwell time
